function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different levels of stringency and compliance may impact R0 differently, leading to varied disease transmission rates.","Impact":"Higher R0 can lead to increased disease spread and difficulty in containment, risking public health and overwhelming healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implement strict measures to ensure high compliance with guidelines and regulations, and adjust stringency based on transmission rates and public behavior.","Technologies":"Digital tracking and monitoring systems, data analytics for trend analysis, and predictive modeling for outbreak forecasting.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government authorities, public health experts.","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, research institutions."}]}
